thread.section_title: PC Game Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PC Game Supply | www.pcgamesupply.com
thread.title: First Time Customer
thread.title_full: PC Game Supply reviewed by First Time Customer

author: First Time Customer
title: First Time Customer
text: There was a problem with my original purchase and a replacement was issued immediately. I had the same problem with the replacement and was given a refund right away. This was addressed much faster than it could have been in a bricks and mortar store. I was going to leave 4 stars since I ended up not getting the product but since they really couldn't have handled it better or faster I made it 5.
